LIVE Cash will never go away but everybody is starting to recognize the cost of cash like printing storing transporting tax The cost of cash is about 1 1 2 of GDP of a country Raghav Prasad Division President SSA
LIVE We ve seen a doubling of the rate of growth of ecommerce transactions A lot of merchants are signing up for ecommerce Raghav Prasad Division President SSA

LIVE Because of the level of digitization Consumers in Africa are demanding for services that aren t here so we have to find a way to build them From risk perspective there will need to be balance CEO
LIVE The role of the AfricanUnion to harmonise policy The spirit for digitisation and trade is present There is a big opportunity to pick best practice and create a coherent regulatory framework CEO

LIVE In Tanzania we re working on a programme to allow farmers to digitally buy and sell their own crop This data can lead to loans to micro farmers to buy fertilizers amp seeds to grow their business Raghav Prasad Division President SSA
LIVE We need to find new ways and innovate to roll out capability Digital transactions generate data which can be transformational Raghav Prasad Division President SSA

LIVE Progress comes when everybody up and down the value chain from regulator to the smallest fintech come together to transform the economic landscape and digitise transactions Raghav Prasad Division President SSA
LIVE There are parts to accelerate digital growth and M pesa have created a great foundation at scale That needs to be combined with a trust infrastructure like providing access to an ID system CEO

LIVE There needs to be a solid business proposition for providers amp high value offering for customers like M Pesa We expect that customer habits will change despite a vaccine regarding trusting digital commerce CEO

LIVE The opportunity and challenge is so large we all need to collaborate We have worked with government in Nigeria and Tanzania where we have launched digital payments Raghav Prasad Division President SSA
LIVE There is a heavy drive to government digitisation and financial inclusion There are now about 400 fintech companies across Africa We are seeing startups innovating in this sector CEO
LIVE We have seen customer and transaction growth as well as a move towards a cashless society Interim CEO at M Pesa Africa

LIVE We are a purpose led company We want to transform lives and the services and products that we roll out are designed to make a difference We are using technology for the betterment of the country Interim CEO at M Pesa Africa
LIVE Collaboration and partnership in the financial sector is important to delivering mobile money Interim CEO at M Pesa Africa
LIVE We have been at the forefront of financial inclusion We aim to broaden access to financial services Interim CEO at M Pesa Africa
LIVE There is a big task tp bring the youth into the digital economy CEO
LIVE We lack the products and business models regional integration and the full tools needed to accelerate the digital revolution in small sectors CEO

LIVE We want to get a billion people into the digital economy by 2025 Digital is the only way to keep the financial economy going for individuals and both big and small business Raghav Prasad Division President SSA
